txt.en: 'A brief pause, and we can continue.'
You have failed to defend Juhani
Juhani, reported missing by his friend Tero back in Zigilgund, is trapped on the isle of Kissa-sari.
'My thanks! Without you, I would have had great difficulty getting off that island.'
'We should be careful. Let us catch our breath.'
'Thank the Ice Spirits! Every time I have tried to escape on my own, I have been turned back by the long fangs of the kalpa-kita. Will you escort me back to the road?'
Juhani, reported missing by his friend Tero back in Zigilgund, is trapped on the isle of Kissa-sari. He wishes your help in ensuring him safe passage.
'Thank you! You have been of great aid to my friend.'
You have escorted Juhani to safety. You should tell Tero that he is now safe.
